resources.string: Mastermind is a very simple code breaking game invented in the 1970\'s (according to wikipedia)\n The game involves a set of 8 Guesses, and an Answer, each of which contains 4 pegs; each peg has 6 possible colors. Your job, as the player, is to successfully determine the solution in less then 8 guesses. After each guess, the game will give you feedback in the section to the right of the guess. If you guess the correct color of a peg, but guess that color in the incorrect spot, there will be a white peg in the feedback section. If you guess the correct color of a peg, and make that guess in the correct spot, there will be a black peg in the feedback section. Use these hints in order to successfully guess the code and win the game!
